sentences.en: A quarrel had estranged him from his family.
sentences.cn: 一场争吵使他与家人疏远了.

sentences.en: Arran became increasingly estranged from the mainstream of Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 阿伦变得越来越脱离好莱坞的主流了。

sentences.en: He was laid to rest yesterday without a final goodbye from his estranged son.
sentences.cn: 他昨天去世了，关系疏远的儿子没来作最后的道别。

sentences.en: His foolish behavior estranged all his friends.
sentences.cn: 他的愚蠢行为令所有的朋友与之疏远.

sentences.en: It was not long before Olympias and Philip were bitterly estranged.
sentences.cn: 没隔多久,奥林匹阿斯和菲力浦就无情地疏远了.

sentences.en: Joanna spent most of her twenties virtually estranged from her father.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜在20多岁的大部分时间和她爸爸几乎不来往。

sentences.en: No matter is originally familiar, also become slowly becomes estranged.
sentences.cn: 不论原来多么熟悉, 也会慢慢变得疏远.

sentences.en: Some of my friends estranged themselves from me in my misfortune.
sentences.cn: 我倒霉时,有些朋友就疏远了我.

sentences.en: The affair has estranged him from his family.
sentences.cn: 这件事已使他和家人疏远.

sentences.en: The argument estranged him from his brother.
sentences.cn: 争吵使他同他的兄弟之间的关系疏远了.

sentences.en: The most remote two points in this world are two estranged hearts.
sentences.cn: 人世间相距最远的两点,是两颗隔膜的心.

sentences.en: They are rather estranged from each other.
This kind of phenomenon estranged the connection between business operator and statistic.
sentences.cn: 这种现象疏远了企业经营者与统计之间的联系.

sentences.en: What has estranged the two friends from each other?
sentences.cn: 是什么原因使这两个朋友疏远的 呢 ?

sentences.en: Years of boarding school estranged the child from her home.
sentences.cn: 常年的寄宿学校生活使得这个孩子和家庭疏远了.

words.tran_cn: 使疏远；使隔离；使离间（estrange的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 疏远的，隔绝的，疏离的，久未联系的，（夫妻）分居的
trans.tran_en: no longer seeing or talking to a relative or good friend, because of an argument

trans.tran_cn: 使疏远，使隔离，使离间(estrange的过去式和过去分词)
